Lylla
 to 
Rocket Raccoon
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
 (stylized as 
Guardians of the Galaxy Volume 3
) is a 2023 superhero film, based on the 
Marvel Comics
 superhero team of the 
same name
. The film is a sequel to 
Guardians of the Galaxy
, 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
, 
Avengers: Endgame
, and 
The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
. It is the thirty-second film in the 
Marvel Cinematic Universe
 and the second installment of 
Phase Five
. The film was released on May 5, 2023.
The film is written and directed by 
James Gunn
 and stars 
Chris Pratt
 as 
Peter Quill/Star-Lord
, 
Zoe Saldana
 as 
Gamora
, 
Dave Bautista
 as 
Drax the Destroyer
, 
Karen Gillan
 as 
Nebula
, 
Pom Klementieff
 as 
Mantis
, featuring 
Vin Diesel
 as the voice of 
Groot
, 
Bradley Cooper
 as the voice of 
Rocket Raccoon
, 
Sean Gunn
 as 
Kraglin Obfonteri
, 
Chukwudi Iwuji
 as the 
High Evolutionary
, 
Will Poulter
 as 
Adam Warlock
, 
Elizabeth Debicki
 as 
Ayesha
, 
Maria Bakalova
 as 
Cosmo the Spacedog
, and 
Sylvester Stallone
 as 
Stakar Ogord
.

Synopsis
[
]
In 
Marvel Studios
' 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
 our beloved 
band of misfits
 are settling into life on 
Knowhere
. But it isn't long before their lives are upended by the echoes of 
Rocket
's turbulent past. 
Peter Quill
, still reeling from the loss of 
Gamora
, must rally his team around him on a dangerous mission to save Rocket's lifea mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.
[
1
]
Plot
[
]
 
 
 
 
 
Adam Warlock
 battles 
Drax
 
 
While the 
Guardians of the Galaxy
 restore the outpost on 
Knowhere
, they put a drunken 
Peter Quill
 mourning the loss of 
Gamora
 to sleep. At that moment, 
Adam Warlock
 suddenly attacks the Guardians, who undergo severe injuries when managing to fight him back. The Guardians find 
Rocket
 near death when Adam retreats, with Rocket having moments of his past flash before his eyes, meeting 
Lylla
, 
Teefs
 and 
Floor
 from 
Batch 89
 after being experimented on for the first time.
 
 
 
 
 
The 
Guardians
 prepare to infiltrate the 
Orgoscope
 
 
The team finds out they can't interact with Rocket, enabling his kill switch, prompting them to find a way to override it and save Rocket by infiltrating 
OrgoCorp
's, Rocket's experimenters, 
headquarters
 with help from the 
Ravagers
. Alongside the Ravagers' newest member, 
Gamora
, the Guardians enter the Orgoscope while Adam has returned to the 
High Evolutionary
 beside 
Ayesha
, but without Rocket. The High Evolutionary threatens Ayesha to get Rocket back to him before he ends the 
Sovereign
 race.
 
 
 
 
 
The 
Guardians
 leave the 
Orgoscope
 damaged
 
 
Rocket remembers bettering the High Evolutionary's way of perfecting life as Peter, Gamora and 
Nebula
 get the pass key while 
Mantis
 and 
Drax
 get 
Groot
 to allow their escape to the 
Bowie
. Seemingly obtaining what they were looking for, an alarm goes off sending 
Orgosentries
 toward the team. They thwart them and escape from the Orgoscope.
 
 
 
 
 
Gamora
 and 
Nebula
 learn of 
Theel
 
 
Rocket has a flashback of him and his friends establishing their names and his promise to travel in a spaceship with them while the Guardians view Rocket's experimentation on the file they got, embedding no pass key. They however find that one of the High Evolutionary's recorders, 
Theel
, has this key downloaded in his memory. They set out to find him on 
Counter-Earth
 as Ayesha confronts a 
Ravager
, fried by Adam when wanting him to tell Gamora's whereabouts, later following Gamora.
 
 
 
 
 
Star-Lord
 and 
Groot
 escape 
Arte Laboratories
 
 
Upon the Guardians' arrival, Rocket is reminded of the High Evolutionary's meltdown concerning Rocket's method being proven to be better. He told Rocket he was never meant to live on Counter-Earth with his friends, who would be shot when Rocket tried to save them, escaping afterwards. With Ayesha's incoming arrival, the Guardians asks a resident's help of finding the recorder, being lead toward the 
ship
 ahead. Quill and Groot meet the High Evolutionary and the recorder while 
War Pig
 is sent to capture Rocket, though fought by Gamora. The ship begins to lift off as the High Evolutionary blows Counter-Earth up, leading Quill to leap off of it with Theel when Nebula, Drax and Mantis try and save them.
 
 
 
 
 
Knowhere
 crashes into 
Arte Laboratories
 
 
Rocket sees a vision of his friends, being invited to join them in time, returning to his friends for now. When Nebula, Drax and Mantis are informed, they are held captive by the High Evolutionary, along with his 
Star Children
, ordering the rest to bring him Rocket. The High Evolutionary's ship is however confronted by the Guardians and Knowhere's cannon. Once the 
Hell Spawn
 are released upon the Guardians and Knowhere, and the cannon fires into the laboratory, Drax's, Mantis' and Nebula's cage opens to three 
Abilisks
 Mantis manages to control. Adam Warlock, held captive on Quill and Gamora's ship, faces them when Gamora threatens his pet 
Blurp
. They escape the ship with Blurp though, landing upon the laboratory's entrance as the ship self-destructs.
 
 
 
 
 
The 
Guardians
 enter 
Arte Laboratories
 
 
Entering the lab, all Guardians fend off the High Evolutionary's troops. They also free every other captive, leading them to Knowhere. Revisiting his former cage, Rocket finds out he is indeed a 
raccoon
 when rescuing a multitude of them. Rocket is soon apprehended by the High Evolutionary, who he fights along with his team members. With the opportunity to end his life, Rocket decides to spare him due to his status as a Guardian of the Galaxy. The High Evolutionary would be imprisoned on Knowhere.
[
2
]
 They have the caged animals hop aboard Knowhere as well, but Quill unfortunately loses his 
Zune
, rushing to retrieve it and try to make it back in time. He slowly drifts in space nonetheless, but was saved by Adam Warlock.
 
 
 
 
 
Rocket Raccoon
 leads the new 
Guardians
 
 
Later, Quill, wanting to spend more time on 
Earth
, Mantis, seeking independence, Drax, raising the Star Children, Nebula, leading Knowhere, and Gamora, returning to the Ravagers, disband from the team, with Rocket now the leader. The new Guardians of the Galaxy, with Warlock, Blurp and Star Child 
Phyla
 as new additions, embark on a mission on 
Krylor
.
 
 
 
 
 
Peter Quill
 meets his 
grandfather
 again
 
 
On Earth, Quill reunites with his grandfather, 
Jason Quill
, that he has not seen since his kidnapping. He'd enjoy breakfast as his grandfather reads a newspaper on 
Kevin Bacon
's 
kidnapping
.

Production
[
]
On March 15, 2017, 
James Gunn
 stated that there were plans for a third 
Guardians of the Galaxy
 film.
[
3
]
On April 17, 2017, James Gunn announced that he would return to write and direct 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
, saying that the film would 
"conclude the story of this iteration of the Guardians of the Galaxy, and help catapult both old and new Marvel characters into the next ten years and beyond."
[
4
]
 He also felt that the three 
Guardians
 films would "work together as a whole", telling one story.
[
5
]
On April 27, 2018, 
Chris Pratt
 confirmed that he would be reprising his role as 
Peter Quill/Star-Lord
 in the film.
[
6
]
On May 29, 2018, 
Dave Bautista
 confirmed that he would be reprising his role as 
Drax the Destroyer
 in the film.
[
7
]
On June 25, 2018, 
Kevin Feige
 stated that James Gunn had completed the first draft of the screenplay and that the film would begin production in early 2019.
[
8
]
On July 20, 2018, 
Walt Disney Studios
 severed ties with James Gunn after old tweets from Gunn surrounding topics such as rape and pedophilia resurfaced.
[
9
]
On July 30, 2018, in response to James Gunn's firing, many of the 
Guardians
 cast members including Chris Pratt, 
Zoe Saldana
, Dave Bautista, 
Bradley Cooper
, 
Vin Diesel
, 
Sean Gunn
, 
Pom Klementieff
, 
Michael Rooker
, and 
Karen Gillan
 issued a statement in support of Gunn.
[
10
]
On August 24, 2018, it was reported that the production of the film was put on hold as a result of James Gunn's firing, so Walt Disney Studios and 
Marvel Studios
 could "regroup".
[
11
]
On October 18, 2018, it was reported that the working title of the film was 
"Hot Christmas"
.
[
12
]
On March 15, 2019, it was reported that Walt Disney Studios had reinstated James Gunn as the writer and director of the film.
[
13
]
On April 30, 2019, it was reported that film was expected to begin production in 2020.
[
14
]
On June 2, 2019, 
Chris Hemsworth
 expressed his interest in possibly reprising his role as 
Thor
 in the film.
[
15
]
On July 20, 2019, at San Diego Comic-Con 2019, Kevin Feige announced that many projects, including 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
, were in development.
[
16
]
On November 29, 2019, Karen Gillan revealed that the film's script was finished and that she had read it.
[
17
]
On November 20, 2020, 
The Hollywood Reporter
 reported that the film would begin production in late 2021.
[
18
]
On December 10, 2020, during Disney's 2020 Investor Day, Kevin Feige announced that the film would be released in 2023.
[
19
]
On May 3, 2021, it was revealed that the film would be released on May 5, 2023.
[
20
]
On May 25, 2021, it was reported that the film's production location had been shifted from 
London
 to 
Atlanta
.
[
21
]
On June 28, 2021, during an interview on 
Jimmy Kimmel Live!
, Chris Pratt revealed that the film was expected to shoot from November to April 2022.
[
22
]
On July 27, 2021, it was reported that 
Sylvester Stallone
 would be reprising his role as 
Stakar Ogord
 in the film.
[
23
]
On September 5, 2021, James Gunn revealed that he had begun storyboarding the film.
[
24
]
On October 11, 2021, 
Deadline
 reported that 
Will Poulter
 had joined the cast of the film and that he would portray 
Adam Warlock
.
[
25
]
 That same day, James Gunn confirmed Poulter's casting.
[
26
]
On October 12, 2021, James Gunn revealed that 
John Murphy
 would be composing the score for the film.
[
27
]
On November 8, 2021, James Gunn revealed that the film had begun production
[
28
]
 and confirmed that 
Chukwudi Iwuji
 had joined the cast of the film in an undisclosed role.
[
29
]
On April 4, 2022, James Gunn revealed that the film had broken the 
Guinness World Record
 for "the most makeup appliances created for a single production".
[
30
]
On May 6, 2022, James Gunn announced that the film had wrapped production.
[
31
]
On June 1, 2022, 
Deadline
 reported that 
Daniela Melchior
 had joined the cast of the film in an undisclosed small role.
[
32
]
On June 6, 2022, 
Deadline
 reported that 
Maria Bakalova
 had joined the cast of the film in an undisclosed key role.
[
33
]
On June 14, 2022, 
Deadline
 reported that 
Nico Santos
 had joined the cast of the film in an undisclosed role.
[
34
]
On July 23, 2022, at San Diego Comic-Con 2022, Kevin Feige announced that Maria Bakalova would voice 
Cosmo
 in the film. It was also revealed that Chukwudi Iwuji would portray 
High Evolutionary
 in the film.
[
35
]
On February 15, 2023, it was reported that 
Asim Chaudhry
 had joined the cast of the film in an undisclosed role.
[
36
]
